channel.title: Writing on Troy Salem Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Troy Salem Blog

item.title: My Career Journey ... So Far
item.description: The story of how I got into tech is a little unconventional and very personal, but it feels like something I need to share. Maybe it gives someone a spark. Maybe it’s just a solid late night read. I won’t run through my whole life, but I do need to start where the picture is honest. I came from a lower income family and life was complicated. In 10th grade I dropped out of high school.
